creator: dnielben@bahiavirtual.com
text:
I modify my tomcat.policy but I cant make the stub travels from srver to 
client. I have to copy the stub in the servlet directory and then it works. The 
servlet is the client.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
Please try your example in Tomcat 3.2.2, and/or perhaps Tomcat 3.3 or
Tomcat 4.0.  If the problem is still present, please open a new bug against
the version that has the problem.  Also, please supply a test case that will
let us duplicate your problem.  I'm afraid we rarely have time to guess the
need details and try to create a test case ourselves.
